text: Huh! The answer is 3 hours 31 minutes 21 seconds. I honestly thought it could be days.
author: jkeefe

text: Got any idea how long it might take to index 3 columns of a 300-million record MySQL database? Asking for a friend.
author: jkeefe

text: Could machine learning help in the next Panama Papers-like investigation? @marinawalkerg thinks so. (I do, too.)
author: jkeefe

text: You can't switch your @nytimes subscription to online-only online. In my case, it took two phone calls, two different agents, and reading my credit card number twice. Pretty sure it was 14 steps, tho @jbenton may check me on that. https://johnkeefe.net/you-cant-make-your-ny-times-subscription-online-only-online …
author: jkeefe

text: A cockpit light can "warn pilots they should prepare to shut down the MCAS." What floors me is that before the Lion Air crash, pilots weren't told MCAS even *EXISTED*
author: jkeefe

text:
This is a must-read.

FAA engineers thot the 737 MAX's anti-stall system could adjust the tail just 0.6 degrees. Actually: "It had full authority to move the stabilizer the full amount ... Nobody should have agreed to giving it unlimited authority.”
author: jkeefe

text: Maybe, maybe not. We're not sure. -- @NYCTSubway
author: jkeefe

text: I think/hope they actually meant "if it doesn't land earlier."
author: jkeefe

text: Currently slated to land at Newark at 6:40 pm Eastern Time.
author: jkeefe

text: Ten 737 Max 8s aloft over North America, as US -- and the world -- grounds 'em all.
author: jkeefe

text: Pretty stark @flightradar24 picture of 737 Max 8s aloft right now.
author: jkeefe

text: From the looks of it, three of the four flights I noted are now on the ground just inside the EU. Seems like the flight ban goes into effect in 15 mins. Maybe they get to refuel and take off? Maybe folks will be stuck half way to their destination?
author: jkeefe

text: (Or at least rerouting, if not going back home.)
author: jkeefe

text: WOW! I just want to spend the next 177 days exploring each one. Thank you for this, and thank you #NICAR19
